name: A Deadly Water Slide Park - A Beach Tilt Ride And Swim Game
name_original: A Deadly Water Slide Park - A Beach Tilt Ride And Swim Game
description:
Plunge yourself in this fun and crazy water slide park!

Slide up the waterslide by tilting sideways.
Move up through the water slide while avoiding obstacles.

Be careful on the edges or you might fall off!

Have Fun!
